#345 (CUE)

stdin foo.json
exec hof vet x.cue json: -

exec hof export foo.json x.cue
cmp stdout golden.stdout

-- foo.json --
{
    "ports": [
        2,
        5,
        7,
        2,
        76,
        98,
        3
    ],
    "newPort": 99
}
-- x.cue --
import "list"

ports: [... int]
newPort: list.Max(ports) + 1

-- golden.stdout --
ports: [2, 5, 7, 2, 76, 98, 3]
newPort: 99
